title: Implement SKRoundRect to support Skia feature

comments.author: VitalickS
comments.body: Sorry, it's my fault. it seemed to me that the skia supports the indication for different angles of the rectangle, but it is not so

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: I checked and they have a special type `SkRRect`. I will investigate getting this supported, but you could probably use a path in the meantime.
